title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
e infected. The same thing will happen to you. You won't life to see it, trust me.

After choosing dialogue 1, Guts will explain that she wants to witness your change, this will give you the following dialogue options.

If I do transform, you'll be my first meal. Keep quiet.

Choosing dialogue 2 will give you the following dialogue choices. If you chose not to let Guts rummage through your memories, it will go directly to this dialogue sequence when you wake up.

[ACROBATICS] Dislocate your wris
